title: 4br/2ba ►Edwardian, Remodeled, Full-Floor, Upper, Flat!
posting_body: Please reply by email to this posting.
•UPDATED, EDWARDIAN, FULL-FLOOR, UPPER FLAT IN A TWO-UNIT, PRIVATE BUILDING!
•Edwardian architecture with ten-foot plus ceilings, two skylights, five rooms, and a common area
•Remodeled gas kitchen with granite counters and all stainless appliances
•Cozy and sunny, shared, yard for your pet, and large park within ½ block
A renovated, Edwardian, upper, full-floor flat is in one of the city's most delightful neighborhoods: The Inner Mission.
Trendy restaurants, shopping, and the nightlife of 24th Street and Valencia Street Gourmet Ghetto are within walking distance from your new home.
The 24th St Mission BART Station is six blocks away, and public transportation is everywhere.
Easy access to the 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the Valley.
The financial district is only ten minutes away, and many private and tech bus routes are nearby.
Walk Score: 99 - Transit Score: 91 - Bike Score: 99
First month's rent and a security deposit of ONE month's rent.
The lease is for one year.
The move-in date is anytime in August or September 1st.
If you would like to attend the showing, please reply by email to this posting.
All showings are by confirmed appointment.
